high_quality_services: We provide high-quality marking services for all types of surfaces
services_description: We offer comprehensive marking services for all types of surfaces and areas, with a focus on quality and durability.
contact_service_description: Contact us today for a free inspection and quote. We tailor solutions to your needs.
about_us_description_1: We are Viken Oppmerking, a company that provides professional marking of parking lots, roads, and industrial areas in Viken and surrounding areas.
about_us_description_2: We offer marking of parking lots, roads, sports courts, school yards, and other areas around the city. We use professional materials and equipment to ensure that the marking is durable and visible for a long time.
about_us_description_3: We have a responsibility to ensure that all markings are durable and visible for a long time. We use professional materials and equipment to ensure that the marking is durable and visible for a long time.
projects_description: See our previous projects and work we have done for various clients.
contact_for_quote: Contact us today for a free quote
parking_service_description_1: We perform marking of standard parking spaces and special applications, such as parking spaces for disabled persons and electric vehicles.
parking_service_description_2: Our services include marking of space numbering, arrows, and other necessary indications.
parking_service_description_3: We use the highest quality materials to ensure that the marking is durable and visible for a long time.
school_service_description_1: We offer marking of school yards with playgrounds, sports courts, and safety zones.
school_service_description_2: Our markings are colorful, durable, and designed to stimulate children's imagination and activity.
school_service_description_3: We only use non-toxic, environmentally friendly materials that are safe for children.
cleaning_service_description_1: We offer thorough cleaning and washing of garage surfaces, parking lots, and other areas.
cleaning_service_description_2: This is often a necessary step before marking to ensure the best possible result and durability.
cleaning_service_description_3: We use professional equipment and environmentally friendly cleaning agents to do the job efficiently.
cleaning_partnership_note: Our washing services are performed in collaboration with Asker Bærum Vaktmester Kompani.
fixing_service_description_1: We repair asphalt roads, footways, and other surfaces.
fixing_service_description_2: All surfaces are repaired in a safe and professional manner to ensure long life and functionality.
fixing_service_description_3: We can also provide advice on optimal placement of equipment for the best possible traffic safety.
consultation_description: We start with a thorough inspection to understand your needs and the scope of the project.
planning_description: We develop a detailed plan for the project, including timeline and material selection.
execution_description: We perform the work with high precision and quality, focusing on details and durability.
parking_service_description_short: Professional marking of parking spaces, including disabled spots and EV charging areas.
school_service_description_short: Creative and safe playground markings to inspire activity and learning.
cleaning_service_description_short: Thorough cleaning and washing of garage surfaces, parking lots, and other areas.
fixing_service_description_short: Repair of asphalt, footpaths and other surfaces with focus on quality.
featured_projects_description: Take a look at some of our recent projects and see the quality of our work.
testimonial_1_text: The team at Viken Oppmerking did an excellent job with our parking lot marking. The work was completed on time and to a high standard.
testimonial_2_text: We are very happy with the playground markings. The children love the new colorful designs, and the quality is outstanding.
contact_cta_description: Contact us today for a free quote and consultation. We're ready to help you with your marking needs.
form_success: Thank you for your message. We will respond as soon as possible.

invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
